programmes.show_description: Seirbheis còmhla ris an Urr Coinneach Dòmhnallach, an Eaglais Shaor Leantainneach. Gaelic service with Rev Kenneth MacDonald, retired Free Church Continuing Minister.
Taghadh de laoidhean is sailm a chaidh a chruinneachadh airson Bliadhna nan Òran. A selection of hymns and psalms selected from the Bliadhna nan Òran / Year of Gaelic Song project.
Taghadh à prògraman na seachdain air a thoirt thugaibh le Anna Nic na Ceardaich. A selection from the week's programmes with Anne Sinclair.
Eòghann MacEunraig le taghadh de cheòl na pìoba. Ewen Henderson presents a selection of pipe music.
Cluinnear ceòl bho Ali Levack, Lusa agus Mumford & Sons san taghadh aig Mairead NicIllinnein. Mairead MacLennan's playlist includes music from Ali Levack, Lusa and Mumford & Sons.
Podcast do luchd-ionnsachaidh ceangailte ris an t-sreath SpeakGaelic air BBC ALBA. Weekly podcast for Gaelic learners, accompanying the BBC ALBA series SpeakGaelic.
Litir Bheag na seachdain sa le Ruairidh MacIlleathain. Litir àireamh 1085. This week's short letter for Gàidhlig learners.
Podcast do luchd-ionnsachaidh na Gàidhlig ceangailte ris an t-sreath SpeakGaelic air BBC ALBA. Weekly podcast for Gaelic learners, accompanying the BBC ALBA series SpeakGaelic.
Litir do Luchd-ionnsachaidh le Ruairidh MacIlleathain. Litir àireamh 1389. Roddy Maclean reads this week's letter for Gàidhlig learners.
Prògram de cheòl Ceilteach ùr à Alba is Èirinn.  New Celtic music from Scotland and Ireland.
Seirbheis còmhla ris an Urr Coinneach Dòmhnallach, an Eaglais Shaor Leantainneach. Gaelic service with Rev Kenneth MacDonald, retired Free Church Continuing Minister.
Prògram a tasglann Fàilte air a' Bhaile. Thadhal Mòrag Dhòmhnallach air an t-Iochdar ann an 1986. Fàilte air a Bhaile in  Iochdar, South Uist, from the BBC archive.
Tha BBC Radio nan Gaidheal mar BBC Radio Alba. BBC Radio nan Gaidheal joins BBC Radio Scotland.
Comhla ri Iain Moireach, nach maireann, Èildear ann an Eaglais Shaor Dowanvale, Glaschu 2012. Gaelic service conducted by John Murray, Elder in Dowanvale Free Church, Glasgow 2012.
Taghadh à prògraman na seachdain air a thoirt thugaibh le Anna Nic na Ceardaich. A selection from the week's programmes with Anne Sinclair.
Tha BBC Radio nan Gaidheal mar BBC Radio Alba. BBC Radio nan Gaidheal joins BBC Radio Scotland.
Naidheachdan ionadail, nàiseanta is eadar-nàiseanta gach madainn. Local, national and international news each morning.
Còmhradh, deasbad, cultar agus cur-seachadan. Conversation, discussion, culture and lifestyle.
Tha Mairead NicIllinnein a' feitheamh ribh le taghadh ciùil traidiseanta Gàidhlig. Mairead MacLennan presents a great choice of traditional Gaelic music.
Naidheachdan, còmhradh, spòrs, ceòl agus fealla-dhà. News, chat, sport, music and entertainment.
Ceòl Gàidhealach 's Ceilteach agus fiosrachadh air na tha dol agaibhse gach feasgar. Gaelic and Celtic music and a round-up of what's on. Post-d - dethadol@bbc.co.uk.
Prògram a tasglann Fàilte air a' Bhaile. Thadhail Aonghas Dòmhnallach air Aiginis san Rubha ann an 1985. Fàilte air a Bhaile in Aiginish, Point in1985 from the BBC archive.
Cluinnear òrain bho Vince Gill, Josh Turner, Don Williams agus Kane Brown. A selection of country music old and new.
Naidheachdan nàiseanta is ionadail o Dhiluain gu Dihaoine. National and local news from Monday to Friday.
Ceòl, fealla-dhà agus sùil air spòrs ionadail, nàiseanta agus eadar-nàiseanta. Music and entertainment with Derek Pluto Murray along with his Musical Links. Tweet @DerekPluto.
Ceòl, amaideas 's na beachdan agaibh air cuspairean a' là airson ur cuir ann a sunnd airson na seachdain. Music, opinion and general nonsense to get your week off to a good start.
Naidheachdan, còmhradh, spòrs, ceòl agus fealla-dhà. News, chat, sport, music and entertainment.
Còmhradh, deasbad, cultar agus cur-seachadan. Conversation, discussion, culture and lifestyle.
Tha BBC Radio nan Gaidheal mar BBC Radio Alba. BBC Radio nan Gaidheal joins BBC Radio Scotland.
